Stria medullaris.Definition: White matter pathway located in the superior wall of the third ventricle along the dorsal-medial margin of the diencephalon; contains axons that interconnect the anterior hypothalamus and septal nuclei in the medial basal forebrain with the habenula, a component of the epithalamus. (http://www.sylvius.com/index/s/stria_medullaris.html)]]
